name: The Body Monstrous
description:
Take care of your body.
A short narrative horror game.

If you experience glitchy/stuttering audio and are using Chrome, try playing on Firefox instead. It's caused by a recent Chrome regression :(

Length: ~15 minutes
Made in Godot.

Note: if you want to replay after finishing, refresh the webpage and reload. The audio players don't all get properly reset at the end of the game. I will fix this... eventually.

-----------

Content warnings (** spoilers ** - highlight below to view):

  • Mild flickering lights
  • Blood
  • Body horror
  • Loud noises
  • Suicidal ideation
  • Suicide attempt (abstractly)
